description: Name of the workgroup or business unit this work order type is associated with, used to scope applicability within fleet operations.
Abbreviated code for the work order category. Values map to predefined service categories; likely a controlled list maintained by the business; confirm with SME.
User ID or system identifier that created this record for audit tracking.
Timestamp when this record was created in the system, used for audit history and time-based reporting.
User ID or system identifier that last modified this record; blank if never updated.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this record; null or blank if never updated.
